data.title: Ordered take out
data.text:
I began ordering take out August 2016. The restaurant is clean, including the restroom, I have also entered the business from the rear, which I walked through the kitchen, I observed the kitchen to be clean and orderly, and the cooks appeared clean looking. All the meals I have ordered where tasty, I just had to add flavor for my tasting, which was supplied by the restaurant, as far as meats and seafood the restaurant should add more, the veggies over power the meals. I ordered by phone. The meals are ready on time as promised. I will recommend.
Johnnie Belinda Jackson

data.title: Save your patience for something worth more than dinner- dealing with these people is an absolute nightmare.
data.text: Food is good- but service is terrible....my order did not make its way through their "online ordering" ordering website correctly, and when I called, they doubted my description and even hung up on me. Customer service really defines a Chinese Restaurant, in my opinion- and this one- is not worth the effort to get a decent meal. This has happened a few times, and I really wanted to give them the benefit of the doubt since they are so close, but I'ill go across town next time for Ming Toy's.
